entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] `NavigationManager.Refresh()` fails during static server rendering if server interactivity is enabled #51482
  • F# discriminated union custom converter isn't used. #51481
  • Blazor style guide for using of leading @ when specifying a component render mode #51480
  • Blazor Identity with Global RenderMode #51476
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #51475
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #51474
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #51473
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #51472
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #51471
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #51470
  • Perf improvement: mvc #51469
  • Unsure how to inject HttpClient for InteractiveAuto render mode (RC2) #51468
  • Several issues with Kestrel header processing. #51467
  • System.ObjectDisposedException: Cannot access a disposed object (IServiceProvider) #51460
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, single_query, updates #51458
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, updates, updates #51457

Closed

  • IDX40001: Issuer: 'https://tenantname.b2clogin.com/tenantId/v2.0/', does not match any of the valid issuers provided for this application. #51005
    8.0.0
  • [NETSDKE2E] Alpine Only, with .NET 8.0 RTM warning: Failed to read or parse localization file when creating new project for the first time. #51198
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #51431
  • Content-Length mismatch randomly on high throughput when using Output Caching #51009
    8.0.0
  • There is an error "Exception while reading WASM runtime capabilities: TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined " when dotnet watch Blazor WASM app after installing .NET 8.0-rtm at first time #51208
    8.0.0
  • Hot reload changes not applied for WebAssembly-rendered pages in Blazor Web app #50765
    8.0.0
  • Update Third Party Notices if needed #48727
    8.0.0
  • Is {PARAMETER NAME}Expression API in blazor data binding internal only? #51444
  • InputRadio didn't accept "checked" attribute #51451
  • NavigationManager.NavigateTo makes a GET request when navigating between server interactive pages. #51465
  • Streaming rendering incompatible with certain hosting environments? #50915
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • Model for referencing a component from another component - declaratively #51340
  • Blazor The trust relationship between the primary domain and the trusted domain failed with custom ServerAuthenticationStateProvider class. #51350
  • [Blazor .Net 8 RC2] Not able to register services in Wasm client project #51432
  • `CreatedResult` should accept null location #39454
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #51459
  • Asp.Net Core API controller memory leak repopend #45098 #48641
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #51448
  • Perf regression: plaintext #51449
  • An exception occurs when running an app using BlazorWebView on a machine different from the one on which it was built. #51409
  • Static routes as string parameters for better SSR (enhancement nav) experience. #51263

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 7.0.14 #51479
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Update branding to 6.0.25 #51478
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Update Weather.razor to simplify [StreamRendering] attribute usage. #51477
    area-mvc
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Remove network.protocol.name from request duration metric #51456
    Servicing-approved, area-hosting, 8.0.x

Merged

  • [main] Critical fix to output cache; remove OutputCacheEntry recycling #51348
    area-networking, area-middleware, 9.0-preview1
  • Update the Microsoft.IdentityModel.* and Microsoft.Identity.Web.* packages to the latest patch release (7.0.3 & 2.15.2) #51430
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-auth, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51137
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 8.0.0
  • Update third party notices for Components and ProjectTemplates #51443
    area-blazor, tell-mode, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [Blazor] Update Selenium versions #50809
    area-infrastructure
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution
